summary.Title: Welder jobs available in Svendborg
summary.Presentation:
Type of employment: permanent Location: 5700 SvendborgStarting date: as soon as possible
Job description Welde

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Type of employment: permanent
Location: 5700 Svendborg
Starting date: as soon as possible

Job description
Welders needed in Svendborg, Denmark. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their application or calling +45 88448244 during our office hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00-15:00 and Friday 9:00-13:00.

Job duties and responsibilities

  • Read and interpret blueprints, drawings, and welding specifications.

  • Set up and operate welding equipment (MIG/MAG and TIG).

  • Perform welding operations according to required standards (135, 136, 138).

  • Ensure welds meet quality and safety standards.

  • Inspect finished welds for defects and ensure proper dimensions.

  • Maintain a clean and safe work environment.

  • Collaborate with other team members to complete projects efficiently.

Job requirements

  • Minimum 1 year of proven experience in MIG/MAG and TIG welding.

  • Knowledge of welding standards (135, 136, 138).

  • Ability to read and interpret technical drawings.

  • Strong attention to detail and quality consciousness.

  • English skills: medium level required

Qualifications

  • Driver's license required: B or BE recommended 

Salary and benefits

  • Hourly gross salary: starting from 170.00 kr./hour.

  • Accommodation and transportation to work: provided if needed.

  • Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIR, SKAT, BorgerService, and all the other authorities, free of charge.
